entry.title: $2500 // * LARGE 1.5 BEDROOM APT * PRIME LOCATION * NO BROKER FEE * WON'T LAST!
entry.content:
* Large 1.5 Bedroom railroad apartment one bedroom plus two extra office rooms, IN PRIME LOCATION!!!

* Newly renovated modern finished building with Laundry room and FURNISHED BACKYARD in famous DOWNTOWN BROOKLYN LOCATION!!! There are 8 train lines near by turning your commute into a breeze. the A C F R and 2 3 4 5 trains are all nearby.

* Large layout with full separate living room and separate kitchen, 2 extra railroad rooms that can be converted for 2nd bedroom or home office space!, the main bedroom is a large king size room with great size closet, tall ceiling, Stainless steel new kitchen appliances, Plenty windows throughout the apartment that gets great sunlight!!! The Apartment has Lot's Of Character Original Detail left for the Tenant to enjoy!! !

* Building Amenities: WASHER DRYER in building, Furnished backyard / garden for the entire building to share. Guarantors accepted Pets Allowed - upon approval. PRIME LOCATION!!!Near the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridge and the Brooklyn Queens Expressway . There is 8 train lines near by turning your commute into a breeze. F at York St, A C F R at Jay St - Metro Tech, R 2 3 4 5 at Borough Hall, A C at High St, 2 3 at Hoyt St

Guarantors accepted
Pets Allowed - upon approval,
Laundry in the building,
NO BROKERS FEE LISTING !!!

Showing By Appointment, Contact Izzy show contact info
